original_text: And they were helped against them, and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand, and all that were with them: for they cried to God in the battle, and he was intreated of them; because they put their trust in him.
korean_text: 도우심을 입었으므로 하갈 사람과 그들과 함께 있는 자들이 다 그들의 손에 패하였으니 이는 그들이 싸울 때에 하나님께 의뢰하고 부르짖으므로 하나님이 그들에게 응답하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: And they were helped against them
and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand
and all that were with them
for they cried to God in the battle
and he was intreated of them
because they put their trust in him
